entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kingston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:10 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kingston Airport 6:46 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle and flurries. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
